messages.content: In this coming General Election, you have the chance to vote for a real alternative.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reverses the privatisation of the NHS and commits to funding it properly.
Says no to a hard Brexit and offers the people the chance to have their say on the final deal.
Builds 500,000 council houses and introduces proper rental controls.
Ensures that tackling climate change remains a national and a global priority.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the Oxford East constituency, the Conservatives cannot win. For decades their vote here in council and General Elections has not risen above 21%.

issues.brexitEurope: Says no to a hard Brexit and offers the people the chance to have their say on the final deal.
issues.environment: Ensures that tackling climate change remains a national and a global priority.
issues.health: Reverses the privatisation of the NHS and commits to funding it properly.

community.content: Builds 500,000 council houses and introduces proper rental controls.

leaflet.personalStatement: As my brother, Senator Bernie Sanders, has said, to win this battle requires a political revolution. I have been signed up to that battle all my adult life. With your help, I would like the chance to now wage it in Parliament.

examples: In the Oxford East constituency, the Conservatives cannot win. For decades their vote here in council and General Elections has not risen above 21%.
In this coming General Election, you have the chance to vote for a real alternative.
The Green Party believes that we should reverse this trend and ensure that everyone can share in our country's wealth.
With your help, I would like the chance to now wage it in Parliament.
Reverses the privatisation of the NHS and commits to funding it properly.
Says no to a hard Brexit and offers the people the chance to have their say on the final deal.
Builds 500,000 council houses and introduces proper rental controls.
Ensures that tackling climate change remains a national and a global priority.

personalStories.story: As my brother, Senator Bernie Sanders, has said, to win this battle requires a political revolution. I have been signed up to that battle all my adult life.

examples: In the Oxford East constituency, the Conservatives cannot win. For decades their vote here in council and General Elections has not risen above 21%.
